reviews: LOVE this bar. It quickly became my go to spot for adult beverages. Great atmosphere with an awesome staff.

reviews: This is a must see if you are visiting Houston or live in Houston. Currently the installation on the bottom floor is pretty cool. Won't spoil it for you but...
